english.segment1: Jesus King of angels heaven's light. Shine Your face upon this house tonight. Let no evil come into my dreams. Light of heaven keep me in Your peace. Remind me how You made dark spirits flee. And spoke Your power to the raging sea. And spoke Your mercy to a sinful man. Remind me Jesus this is what I am
english.segment2: CHORUS: The universe is vast beyond the stars. But You are mindful when the sparrow falls. And mindful of the anxious thoughts. That find me, surround me and bind me
english.segment3: With all my heart I love You Sovereign Lord. Tomorrow let me love You even more. And rise to speak the goodness of Your name. Until I close my eyes and sleep again
english.segment5: Jesus King of angels heaven's light. Hold my hand and keep me through this night
